commit message: Added Genre combo to Shuffle dialog (thanks archrival for parsers)
Added Genre fragment (thanks archrival)
Forgot to enable fast scroll on genre fragment
Only apply sorting on version > 4.7
Fix for some edge cases in sorting, surround with try/catch to never bother user if it fails
Finished adding 4x1-4x4 widgets (Thanks archrival)
Merge widgets
Add refresh to genres for when doing manual refresh
Added ability to create new playlist from add to playlist menu
Supposed to be protected, not private...
Set playlist suggested name + merged old download activity method
When changing servers, set folder back to all to avoid index > folder size on new server
Close #132 Fix removing the active server
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/daneren2005/Subsonic.git
Fix for Madsonic not always setting parent id
Added option to overwrite existing playlists for 4.7+
Added option to do raw video (thanks Sindre)
Slight tweak to player descriptions
Fix Shuffle Buffer sometimes trying to refill forever
Updated to 4.0.4
